name: Desktop Deathmatch
description:
This is a good old fashioned top-down shooter which is player vs player, via keyboard controls.

Each weapon has its pros and cons, so try them all out. Sometimes the best tactic is to drop your weapon and run...

This started off as just a mess-around prototype, but we kept adding new weapons and had a lot of fun. It ended up quite playable, so here it is.

If it ends up proving popular, we may redo it properly with decent artwork, animations and other juice.
